definition: surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: But the consensus around the Gulf Coast is turning more apoplectic and apocalyptic.
sentences.chinese: 但在墨西哥湾海岸的舆论正变得越来越激烈和末世论。

sentences.english: Do you want to learn how to fly-fish for tarpon in the 1)Gulf of Mexico?
sentences.chinese: 想不想到墨西哥湾学习用假蝇钓大海鲢？

sentences.english: BP readies 'top kill' to plug oil leak in Gulf of Mexico .
sentences.chinese: BP将尝试封闭墨西哥湾海底石油漏孔。

sentences.english: At number one is Teotihuacán located on the bay of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 位列第一的是出于墨西哥湾的特奥蒂瓦坎古城。

sentences.english: Researchers believe that some hummingbirds fly non-stop over the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 研究员相信，一些蜂鸟会马不停蹄地飞越墨西哥湾。

sentences.english: The situation in the Gulf of Mexico is imminent.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥湾的局势火烧眉毛。

sentences.english: It was blamed for more than one thousand eight hundred deaths along the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 它被指责为超过一千八百年沿墨西哥湾的死亡。

sentences.english: But she says the recovery of the Gulf is far from complete.
sentences.chinese: 但是她表示，墨西哥湾的恢复工作还远远没有完成。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the region continues to lose minute but measurable ground to the Gulf of Mexico every month.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，该地区每个月都在墨西哥湾中一点点下陷。

sentences.english: Counter-clockwise flow around the low drew up plenty of moisture from the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 逆时针方向环流着从墨西哥湾来的大量湿空气。

sentences.english: Suppose a wind is blowing from the Gulf of Mexico northward across the southeast United States.
sentences.chinese: 一股风正从墨西哥湾向北吹，横扫美国西南部。

sentences.english: One, the Texas Gulf Coast , is in the Gulf Coast geosyncline.
sentences.chinese: 得克萨斯海湾有一海岸在墨西哥湾海岸地槽中。

sentences.english: Magnificent frigatebirds, on the other hand, move into the Gulf in warm months.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，丽色军舰鸟则在温暖的月份来到墨西哥湾。

sentences.english: Other factors include hurricanes in the Gulf of Mexico (GOM). The 2003-2008 years had lots of hurricanes, with Katrina being the most famous.
sentences.chinese: 其它因素还包括墨西哥湾的飓风。

sentences.english: The disaster in the Gulf of Mexico just makes that clearer.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥湾的灾害使得这个需要更为清楚。

sentences.english: Oil is still gushing into the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 石油仍然滔滔不绝的流入墨西哥湾。

definition: Lake Erie, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
